Docs.summary: Called to stream the statements in the source into a StatementSink.
Docs.remarks: The method is called on for each statement in this StatementSource.

Docs.summary: Gets whether the statement source returns only distinct statments from Select calls.
Docs.value: True if any call to Select (and its overloads when they are implemented) yields only distinct statements (i.e. no duplicates).

Docs.summary: A source of statements, such as a RdfReader or a Store.
Docs.remarks: Access to the statements in this source is provided through calling Select.
